author: Josh.5
description:
Ignore files under the configured size.
Sizes can be written as:
 [list][*]Bytes (Eg. '50' or '800 B'), 
[*]Kilobytes (Eg. '100KB' or '23 K'), 
[*]Megabytes (Eg. '9M' or '34 MB'), 
[*]Gigabytes (Eg. '4GB'), 
[*]Terabytes (Eg. '1 TB'), 
[*]Petabytes (Eg. '0.5PB'), 
[*] etc...[/list]
For best results, ensure Unmanic is configured to run this plugin last in the 'Plugin Flow'.
name: Ignore files by size on disk
